dmca.title: Re: Ceist and Desist Demand
dmca.body:
The entire C&D is scanned and I will provide it on the next page.  But please note these overly broad demands:

"Accordingly, we demand that mReplay immediately cease any and all: (i) use of the Sling Products; (ii) interference with Sling's contractual relations, including those established by Sling's standard license terms; and (iii) use of the name "Slingbox" and any other mark confusingly similar to Sling's mark, as well as use of Sling's trade dress, trade secrets and other intellectual property."
